metadata.synopsis: In SwA, Scratch speaks like a human. He doesn't have any kind of dog-like affectation, nor is he stupid - he's well-spoken, even when he's saying 'dog' things.Scratch, the dog a dead courier we met during our travels, appears in our camp at night, having retrieved something. We can engage in a little tug of war in order to see what he's fetched.
metadata.how_to_trigger: in reConoe fullcampClick on campsiteTalk to dog

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *The dog holds a well-chewed ball in his mouth.*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a ball in his mouth.

107.speaker: Scratch
107.text: All right. It's only fair that you enjoy it, too.
107.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the ball before speaking.

66.speaker: Scratch
66.text: But if you feel like throwing it - I wouldn't mind that at all.

23.speaker: Scratch
23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks sad, head bowed.InternalNodeContext: SFX only. Sad dog whine.

88.speaker: Player
88.text: Look him over for any signs of injury from the owlbear cub.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: *Nothing - he's fine. It seems the cub didn't attack Scratch, despite the sounds you heard in the night.*
75.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player glances up and down. Scratch watches the player.

13.speaker: Player
13.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player petted Scratch before (to prevent approval spam)

97.speaker: Narrator
97.text: *Scratch's tongue lolls out happily, his tail wagging even faster.*

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *The dog pants through a ball held firmly in his mouth.*
43.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a ball in his mouth.

47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog drops the ball on the ground

79.speaker: Narrator
79.text: *He relinquishes the ball. It is well-chewed and slick with drool.*

117.speaker: Narrator
117.text: *His eyes track the ball avidly. He shuffles on his paws, ready to chase after it...*

63.speaker: Scratch
63.context: CinematicNodeContext: Watching the ball, eager to playNodeContext: A playful bark

127.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player wrestles with the dog and gets the ball

73.speaker: Scratch
73.context: CinematicNodeContext: Maintains his grip on the ball.

57.speaker: Player
57.text: Distract him with one hand and slip the ball from his jaws with the other.

39.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player distracts the dog with one hand and slips the ball from his jaws

103.speaker: Player
103.text: Encourage him to drop the ball.

44.speaker: Scratch
44.text: It's certainly good to be back at camp! How I've missed the smells.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: All's well that ends well, eh, boy?

90.speaker: Player
90.text: I'm glad you're back where you belong.

106.speaker: Scratch
106.text: I just hope Dringo is fine. Mar'hyah has a mean streak.

82.speaker: Scratch
82.text: Indeed. And I'm sure Dringo will do a great job - he always took good care of me.

55.speaker: Scratch
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks happy, tail waggingNodeContext: SFX only. Happy dog bark

54.speaker: Scratch
54.text: It's not the same here. Feels emptier.
54.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks sad, head bowed.InternalNodeContext: If the owlbear cub dies at somepoint after a relationship
has been estabplished between the two characters after their
camp night moment.

34.speaker: Scratch
34.text: The young cub. He's gone... for good.

69.speaker: Narrator
69.text: *The dog looks up at you, his eyes big and mournful.*

15.speaker: Player
15.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player petted Scratch before (to prevent approval spam)

86.speaker: Narrator
86.text: *The dog gives a soft whine of appreciation.*

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *You spot a name on the dog's collar - 'Scratch'.*

81.speaker: Narrator
81.text: *The dog is unable to speak through the small bag he holds in his mouth.*
81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a small bag in his jaws.

19.speaker: Scratch
19.text: I don't know. Maybe you can tell me. ([CAMP_Courier_Dog_FetchedItemDescription_50004d01-651b-a7ea-308a-451a9571cb85])
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the bag before speaking.

60.speaker: Scratch
60.text: All I know is I thought of you when I saw it.

40.speaker: Scratch
40.text: I didn't introduce myself before. You can call me Scratch.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: Look him over for any signs of injury from the owlbear cub.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: I heard you and the owlbear cub in the night - I thought something might've happened to you.

105.speaker: Scratch
105.text: No, nothing happened - just the young one having bad dreams. That's what you heard.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog's mouth is empty/he can talk as normal

10.speaker: Player
10.text: I hear you're friends with the owlbear cub.
10.context: InternalNodeContext: Option only available if the CFM was resolved on a later night by speaking to the cub first and later speaking to Scratch

1.speaker: Scratch
1.text: Yes! He's a handful, but I like having him around.
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog's mouth is empty/he can talk as normal

46.speaker: Scratch
46.text: I stay with him and keep him company when he's scared. He'll settle down, in time.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog's mouth is empty/he can talk as normal

104.speaker: Player
104.text: I'm sorry about what happened to your master.

101.speaker: Scratch
101.text: Master, friend... I stayed with him until... until I knew he was gone.

16.speaker: Scratch
16.text: I'll never forget him, but I'm glad to have met you.

65.speaker: Player
65.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player petted Scratch before (to prevent approval spam)

20.speaker: Scratch
20.text: Oh - thank you. That's... that's nice.

25.speaker: Scratch
25.text: Here. I hope you like it. ([CAMP_Courier_Dog_FetchedItemDescription_50004d01-651b-a7ea-308a-451a9571cb85])
25.context: CinematicNodeContext: Drops the bag before speaking.

110.speaker: Narrator
110.text: *The dog wags his tail, a small bag clenched between his teeth.*
110.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch holds a small bag in his jaws.

22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player extends a palm expectantly. Scratch drops the bag and player picks it up

74.speaker: Narrator
74.text: *He gives in and surrenders his find to you.* ([CAMP_Courier_Dog_FetchedItemDescription_50004d01-651b-a7ea-308a-451a9571cb85])

122.speaker: Player
122.text: Reach forward and yank at it.

85.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player yanks bag out of dog's mouth

33.speaker: Scratch
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dog is still holding bag in mouthNodeContext: A playful growl.

120.speaker: Player
120.text: Extend a palm and wait expectantly.

100.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player holds out palm expectantly. A beat while dog wags tail.

119.speaker: Scratch
119.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch looks happy, tail waggingNodeContext: SFX only. Happy dog bark
